nodes.title: Practical Health Evangelism
nodes.description: Find out why health ministry is so important in fulfilling the great commission and why it’s the best application for using Christ’s method in evangelism. This seminar will explore current trends in health evangelism, what’s working best and what some of the common challenges are. Practical examples and testimonies will be shared from around the world to instruct and inspire towards building your own successful community health outreach.

nodes.title: Sanitariums: Role & Connection with the Three Angels' Messages
nodes.description:
God revealed Sanitariums as “one of the most effective agencies to give light to the world” the last days. Sanitarium concept covers medical or surgical institutions with one distinct feature: “the saving of the souls” and “the proclamation of the truth for this time” are central to everything – goals, plans, decisions. We explore:

How Sanitarium blends-in with other agencies fulfilling Revelation 14 Why is high time to open more around the world?

nodes.title: Medical Missionary Work and the 3 Angels' Messages
nodes.description:
This presentation will look at medical missionary work in three realms: historically, presently and prophetically. We will see its connection with the Three Angel’s Messages and the closing crisis.

“Medical missionary work is to be closely connected with the ministry of the Word, bound up with the third angel’s message…When these parts of the work are carried forward on correct lines, the third angel’s message will be given in accordance with God’s purpose.”{5MR 134.3}

nodes.title: The Three Angels' Messages: The Purpose
nodes.description: Against scribes and Pharisees Jesus uttered a scathing rebuke. “You compass sea and land to make one proselyte,” He said, “and when he is made, you make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves.” Matthew 23:15. Not at all flattering.  Yet, it has been 176 years since Jesus transferred from the Holy Place to the Most Holy Place and all we’ve managed as a church during all that time is to replicate ourselves over and over and over again. More and more lukewarm, self-righteous Laodiceans. Why? Because we don’t understand Christ’s purpose in giving us the three Angel’s messages.

nodes.title: The Media Mind - Part 2
nodes.description: Hollywood, popular music, video gaming, spectator sports, and endless social media are saturating the lives of God’s professed people. But what does the latest science say about the mind-altering effects of 21st century media? And what is the spiritual agenda in the entertainment and advertising industries?  Join Scott for 2 sessions on this crucial topic – 1) a review of Media on the Brain, 2) updates from the new seminar, The Media Mind.

nodes.title: Media on the Brain - Part 1

nodes.title: Right Time, Right Place, Right Message
nodes.description: The Three Angel’s Messages are the very core of what we are commissioned to proclaim.  In 9 powerful verses, Revelation 14 describes the people and the message to be shared with an end-time world.  This seminar will portray the mission of Seventh-day Adventists as heaven sees it.

nodes.title: Justification by Faith in the Three Angels' Messages
nodes.description: The truth progressively unfolded in Revelation 14 reveals aspects of God’s character necessary to end the great controversy forever. Understanding this profound yet simple message will open the door for Jesus to finish His work—in us and, through us, for the world. We will examine what makes this last-day gospel message so powerful that it ushers in the latter rain and prepares a people for the final events of earth’s history.
